353a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas shing 'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag las rnam par grol te/ de ltar rnam par bkrol nas nges pa'i phung por rab tu bkod de/ der bkod pa rnams 
353a7(mdo 'grel): phyin chad ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/ de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnam
353a8(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/ zag pa med pa'i chos sam/ 'dus byas kyi chos sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la yang 
353b1(mdo 'grel): gnas par mi 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la 'god pa'i 'phrin las yin no// / 
353b2(mdo 'grel): denas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges zhes bgyi 'am/ ma nges zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 
353b3(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/ ma nges pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ nyan thos kyi phung po 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/ sangs rgyas
353b4(mdo 'grel): kyi phung po 'am/ phung po gang du nges pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 
353b5(mdo 'grel): phung por nges pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
353b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po ni nges zhes bgyi'am/ 'on tam phyir mi ldog par nges zhes bgyi/ skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges zhes bgyi'am/ 'on tam srid pa tha ma nges zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 
353b7(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa'o// phyir mi ldog pa ni nges pa'o// srid pa gcig gis thogs pa ni nges pa'o// gsol pa/ 
353b8(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor 
354a1(mdo 'grel): nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du mi skye'o// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ brgyad pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir 
354a2(mdo 'grel): mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub 
354a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ba dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la
354a4(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgoms pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i dor du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gnas med do// lha tshe ring por skye ba'i gnas med do// 
354a5(mdo 'grel): gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi spyod pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas med do// glen pa dang lkugs par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i gnas med do// mtha' 'khob kyi kla klo dang / mi srun zhing 'khor bzhi rgyur med pa'i yul
354a6(mdo 'grel): du skye ba'i gnas med do// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas med do// gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi bsgrag par 'gyur ba de lta bur skye ba'i 
354a7(mdo 'grel): gnas med do// bya ba ma yin par lta bar ltung ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
354a8(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
354b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i gnas su mi skye ba lags/ gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi rgyud du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/ de'i tshe dge ba'i 
354b2(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi/ lus gang dang gang 
354b3(mdo 'grel): gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su 'dzin kyang / rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
354b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing de la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang bla na med pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing sems can de dag la gnod par mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag
354b5(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par 
354b6(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing byol song gi skye gnas su skyes kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas mi gos par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
354b7(mdo 'grel): 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
354b8(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang med de/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de ltar byang chub 
355a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba med do// dge ba'i chos gang 
355a2(mdo 'grel): yang rdzogs par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba de lta bu med de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
355a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste/ de la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo// / 
355a4(mdo 'grel): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zags 
355a5(mdo 'grel): mkhyem pa de lta dang ldan pa ngan song ngas/ tshul ba dag ste gnasas skye ba 'thar/ bcom ldan 'das rnas pa 'phrul pa/ rab 'akyang canan ga shegs pa 'phags pa zag pa med pa yin nam/ 
355a6(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags shing zag pa mi mnga' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 
355a7(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing / de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ 
355a8(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor des de bzhin gshegs pa byol sang gi skye gnas par 'gyur dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das do na ma lags 
355b1(mdo 'grel): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// 
355b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs
355b3(mdo 'grel): su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ sprul pa des 
355b4(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing las des gzhan gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 
355b5(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/ 
355b6(mdo 'grel): ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du yang mi 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang nyams su mi myong ngo // rab 'byor de ji snyam 
355b7(mdo 'grel): du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma las glang po'i gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sim/ gleng gi gzugs shig bstan tem/ gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na/ de dag glang po'i 
355b8(mdo 'grel): gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sem/ glang gi gzugs sam/ srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 
356a1(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzhan du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa yang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus
356a2(mdo 'grel): yongs su 'dzin te/ lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang 
356a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa dang ldan zhing lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa 
356a4(mdo 'grel): ni thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste de ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par 'jog pa'i phrin las yin no// // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
356a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang las de lta bus mi gos par spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 
356a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar thabs mkhas pa la stod de/ thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re ra'i 'jig rten 
356a7(mdo 'grel): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
356a8(mdo 'grel): gang reg par byed pa dang / gang gis reg par bya ba dang / gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams 
356b1(mdo 'grel): cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la reg par mi byed do// stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la yang reg par mi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
356b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
356b3(mdo 'grel): rgya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la mi gnas kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la gnas shing rnam pa de lta bu'i
356b4(mdo 'grel): thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 
356b5(mdo 'grel): 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'dus pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khong du
356b6(mdo 'grel): chud pa 'am/ khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 
356b7(mdo 'grel): stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 
356b8(mdo 'grel): de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs de dang / khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 
357a1(mdo 'grel): de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi don tshad med pa la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan
357a2(mdo 'grel): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa
357a3(mdo 'grel): gang la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 
357a4(mdo 'grel): 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / chos nyan zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub 
357a5(mdo 'grel): pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
357a6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas 
357a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo // gzhan du na ming dang brdar btags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/ 
357a8(mdo 'grel): gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // gal te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong ste/ gdags pa'i rgyu de dag kyang 
357b1(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa zhig yin na ni/ nyi tshe'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de yang stong pa nyi tshe ba ma yin no// de'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis spong ste/ de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
357b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pal spyod cing / mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du sbyin pa mngon par bsgrubs te/ mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing lha'i mig 
357b3(mdo 'grel): dang / lha'i rna ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang / 'chi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' 
357b4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub
357b5(mdo 'grel): ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dus pa ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de tshol ba'i tshe/ lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas bdag nyid 
357b6(mdo 'grel): kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/ dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i chos de dag
357b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing ro myang bar byed par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do// stong pa nyid ni ro myang bar byed pa med do// de ltar byang chub 
357b8(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/ lha'i mig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ chos de dag la gnas
358a1(mdo 'grel): shing las mngon par sgrub po// las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams chos ston te/ sems cad nam sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do// de ltar mi dmigs 
358a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrubs te/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes par bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed 
358a3(mdo 'grel): do// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ 
358a4(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bapa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/ rnab par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan 
358a5(mdo 'grel): rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
358a6(mdo 'grel): rnams sas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thogs rnams sa pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ seMs yang dag par dag pa rnams sam/ sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan pas kyi chos snyam/ 
358a7(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sA tsAn gang ji
358a8(mdo 'grel): snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/ de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la
358b1(mdo 'grel): bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ phongs pas zil gyis non zhing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims/ 
358b2(mdo 'grel): ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te// 
358b3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na/ bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na// 
358b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod 
358b5(mdo 'grel): sems su gyur pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/ sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na// 
358b6(mdo 'grel): khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga'
358b7(mdo 'grel): tsam gyi go skabs yang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston to// kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ 
358b8(mdo 'grel): le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar
359a1(mdo 'grel): khyed ngan song gsum tu ltung na/ bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lnga ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 
359a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can gang sems g.yeng ba de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni
359a3(mdo 'grel): sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshing rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag kyang gdod par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir 
359a4(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa/ gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ 
359a5(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ shes rab 'chal bas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can 
359a6(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi ste gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de lngar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes 
359a7(mdo 'grel): chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can ji snyed pa de dag gi thams cad ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang 
359a8(mdo 'grel): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyar ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ 
359b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ 
359b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing 
359b3(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi
359b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/ de dag du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / sbyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan nam/ shes rab bam/ byang chub kyi 
359b5(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
359b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
359b7(mdo 'grel): rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub 
359b8(mdo 'grel): sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/ de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ sbyin pa 
360a1(mdo 'grel): byin cig/ phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ phongs pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin la/ bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig/ gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/ 
360a2(mdo 'grel): phongs pas zil gyis non zhing nying sha nying gis zos te/ ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ 
360a3(mdo 'grel): kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can 
360a4(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi ste gnas sam/ gshin rdo'i 'jig rten yin te/ de lta ba kyang ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon par 'aM ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir 
360a5(mdo 'grel): khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 
360a6(mdo 'grel): 'di skad du chos ston to// de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod semasu ma byed cig sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs 
360a7(mdo 'grel): par gyur na/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yin gyis/ de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs 
360a8(mdo 'grel): kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ le los ni 
360b1(mdo 'grel): bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/ le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum 
360b2(mdo 'grel): du lhung na bdag kyang gdon par mi nus na gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems 
360b3(mdo 'grel): can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ kye skyes bu dag sems can g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol 
360b4(mdo 'grel): song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/ gzhan gdon pa lta ci smos kyis/ de'i phyir g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi 
360b5(mdo 'grel): go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te// kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal 
360b6(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na/ gzhan gyis don lta ci smos te/ gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin 
360b7(mdo 'grel): rje'i 'jig rten yin te/ de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o// phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to// 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de 
360b8(mdo 'grel): dag ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro// zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa la sbyor ro// gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro// lam ngan par zhugs pa 
361a1(mdo 'grel): gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing / de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/ 
361a2(mdo 'grel): khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi stong ste/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/ stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos 
361a3(mdo 'grel): ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ral du phyin pa la spyod pa'i rtsa/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no// 
361a4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus te/ lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams 
361a5(mdo 'grel): kyang lam du gzung bar mi nus so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bya 'dab ma med pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang
361a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
361a7(mdo 'grel): tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de dag gi sems can rnams kyi don ji ltar bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do// de lta'i mig 
361a8(mdo 'grel): gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gaN+DI'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi de dag tu song zhing 
361b1(mdo 'grel): sems can de dag gi sems sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/ de dang mthun pa'i sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi 
361b2(mdo 'grel): gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar chos ston to// des lha'i mig gi lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 
361b3(mdo 'grel): nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/ de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 
361b4(mdo 'grel): ma gyis de dag tu badzan sems can dag gi sams sems kyis du chud par cas nas/ de dang mthun par smin pa'i gagasams/ rnal khams dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang 
361b5(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan nam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// des lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di lta ste/ lha dang mi gnyis 
361b6(mdo 'grel): ka'i sgra yang thos te/ de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ zos nas
361b7(mdo 'grel): kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / 
361b8(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan nam/ shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston te/ de'i lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / 
362a1(mdo 'grel): ljon pa dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de 
362a2(mdo 'grel): dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/ thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to// de bzhin nyid du bzung nas de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang // 
362a3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de sems kyi rnam grangs 
362a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing de dag la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ 
362a5(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// 
362a6(mdo 'grel): de bdag gam gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
362a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byung ngo zhes bya bar yang shes te/ sems can sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mos pa/ gang ji snyed pa de dag la yang dag pa nyid du chos 
362a8(mdo 'grel): ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i 
362b1(mdo 'grel): gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed de/ bsnyen bkur
362b2(mdo 'grel): byas nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to// sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab 
362b3(mdo 'grel): kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to// de zag pa med pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de zag pa 
362b4(mdo 'grel): med pa mngon du bya ba'i shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/ sbyin pa'i gtam mam/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab 
362b5(mdo 'grel): kyi gtam mam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/ 'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
362b6(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de mngon par shes pa shin tu 'dris pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu bzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 
362b7(mdo 'grel): bzung zhing / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ 'de ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i 
362b8(mdo 'grel): skyes bu ni dgos pa thams cad byed kyang bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba des gos par 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
363a1(mdo 'grel): gnas shing mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan kyang bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal 
363a2(mdo 'grel): ba des 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse bar byas te/ ci 
363a3(mdo 'grel): nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sangs 
363a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// rab 
363a5(mdo 'grel): 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi 
363a6(mdo 'grel): drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba la sogs pa la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
363a7(mdo 'grel): lam gyi yan lag rdzogs par bgyis shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 
363a8(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang gis bla na med 
363b1(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags// // bam po bdun cu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das 
363b2(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 
363b3(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'o// 'di la btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba
363b4(mdo 'grel): 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus 
363b5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shes rab
363b6(mdo 'grel): bo// bdag gis shes rab sgom mo// 'di'i don du shes rab sgom mo/ zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan 
363b7(mdo 'grel): yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid thams cad dang / 
363b8(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa 
364a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang // 
364a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
364a3(mdo 'grel): rnams so// bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o// 'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ sangs rgyas 
364a4(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
364a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ lam des 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can tshad med pa rnams dang 
364a6(mdo 'grel): de 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar gyur pa dang / brgal ba dang / brgal bar 'gyur ba ste/ lam de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
364a7(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can rnams kyi don byed do// de nas tshe dang 
364b1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos lags na// sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lag// 
364b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos 
364b3(mdo 'grel): kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo // de la byang 
364b4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan 
364b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
364b6(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'ang par de yod do// rab 'byor 'di ga ste dper na zhugs pa yang dag gzhan la/ 'bras bu la gnas pa'ang gzhan te/ de gnyis ka/ yang 'phags pa'i gang 
364b7(mdo 'grel): zag ma yin zhes mi bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
364b8(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
365a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro// zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams 
365a2(mdo 'grel): cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o// 'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o// 'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten/ 
365a3(mdo 'grel): pa'o// 'di ni lha'o// 'di ni mi'o// 'di ni rigs kyi sa'o// 'di ni brgyad pa'o// 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig kya 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// 
365a4(mdo 'grel): 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o// / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar khyad par dang rnam par dbye bar ji ltar 
365a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ las ji ltar dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa 
365a6(mdo 'grel): yang dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa 
365a7(mdo 'grel): la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gang gis rang gis mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyad pa 'am/ legs par spyad pa'am/ 
365a8(mdo 'grel): mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis ngan song gsum du ltung ngo // legs par spyad pa'i lam gyi lha dang mir skye'o// nyams pa med pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi 
365b1(mdo 'grel): khams sam/ gzugs med pa'i khams su skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu// 
365b2(mdo 'grel): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/ nang stong pa nyid la spyad/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
365b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi bar la spyad/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi 
365b4(mdo 'grel): yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
365b5(mdo 'grel): thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
365b6(mdo 'grel): kyi sgo rnams la spyad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad de/ 
365b7(mdo 'grel): nyams pa med pa'i spyod pas byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dang ldan pa la mnyam par bzhag cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon/ 
365b8(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud zod shing rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar mi ltung ba de ltar don byed do// gsol pa/ 
366a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/ bcom 
366a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos nag po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ gnag pa'am/ dkar ba 'am/ mi 
366a3(mdo 'grel): gnag mi dkar bar dmigs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmigs na/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye
366a4(mdo 'grel): gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ lha dang mer ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / 
366a5(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags par mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das 
366a6(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes sam/ gsol pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 
366a7(mdo 'grel): sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug
366a8(mdo 'grel): ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs na sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang / 'khor ba'i rgyud rnams las mi 'grol te/ rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams
366b1(mdo 'grel): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes la mi shes pas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 
366b2(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mthong nas/ sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/ chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 
366b3(mdo 'grel): kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu yod pa ma yin na/ de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing sems can med pa la sems can du 'du shes/ gzugs 
366b4(mdo 'grel): med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes// 
366b5(mdo 'grel): khams rnams med pa la khams su 'du shes rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa la rten cing 'brel par 'du shes/ 'jig rten pa'i chos med pa la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'jig rten las
366b6(mdo 'grel): 'das pa'i chos med pa la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shos/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos med pa la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du shes/ zag pa med pa'i chos med pa la zag pa 
366b7(mdo 'grel): med pa'i chos su 'du shes/ 'du byas kyi chos med pa la 'du byas kyi chos su 'du shes/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos med pa la 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log/ 
366b8(mdo 'grel): gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
367a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
367a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel to// zhes bya ba ni las dang 'bras bur 'grel
367a3(mdo 'grel): pa chud mi za ba la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no// // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
367a4(mdo 'grel): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 
367a5(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sdug bsngal ba dang / 
367a6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams la ston to// 'chad do// 'jog go/ 'god do// 'brel to// rnam 
367a7(mdo 'grel): par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yang dag par brjod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang ji snyed pa gang gi dkon mchog gsum rnam par dgod pade 
367a8(mdo 'grel): dag thams cad yongs su 'dus te/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung bas sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba 
367b1(mdo 'grel): las yongs su 'grel to// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal 
367b2(mdo 'grel): bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te kun 'byung bas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas yongasu mya ngan las 
367b3(mdo 'grel): 'da' bar 'gyur/ lam 'tshal nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sdug bsngal 
367b4(mdo 'grel): shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa 
367b5(mdo 'grel): shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden 
367b6(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das par ngas gsungs te/ sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no// kun 'byung 
367b7(mdo 'grel): shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin no// sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no// 
367b8(mdo 'grel): lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/ lam gyis kyang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal ba yang ma mchis/ sdug bsngal 'tshal ba yang ma mchis// 
368a1(mdo 'grel): kun 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa yang ma mchis/ 'gog pa 'tshal ba yang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ lam 'chal ba yang
368a2(mdo 'grel): ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin 
368a3(mdo 'grel): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung // 
368a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ de bzhin du gnas pa'i dbyings dang / chos kyi dbyings mi 'phel mi 'grib par 'dug pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
368a5(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bden pa khong du chud pa ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
368a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs pa'i don du spyod pa lags/ ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshal te khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas 
368a7(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag ce nas kyang chos gang yang dmigs su med pa de ltar mthong ste/ chos thams cad ma dmigs pas bden par gtogs pa 'am/ bden par ma gtogs pa'i chos 
368b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad stong par mthong ste/ des de ltar mthong bas skyon med par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi sa la gnas pa de spyi bor lhung ba gang gis
368b2(mdo 'grel): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba spyi bor ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rigs kyis de la gnas shing bsam gtan bzhi sgrub po/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzug 
368b3(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub po// de lhag mthong gis de la gnas shing chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed de/ de sdug bsngal yongs su
368b4(mdo 'grel): shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmigs su med pa'i sems mi bskyed do// kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do// 'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'gog pa la dmigs pade 
368b5(mdo 'grel): sems mi bskyed de/ lam sgom yang lam la dmigs pa'i sems mi bskyed do// gzhan du byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar byed do// gsol pa/ 
368b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ stong pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 
368b7(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/ rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/ ngo bo nyid gang la gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang 
368b8(mdo 'grel): rgyab de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la yang ngo bo nyid yod par mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa ni byang chub ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/ dgra bcom pa dang / phyir mi 
369a1(mdo 'grel): 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pas ma byas/ de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/ gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
369a2(mdo 'grel): dag gis kyang ma byas ste/ gzhan du na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis ma shes ma mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs
369a3(mdo 'grel): mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston to zhes bya ba ni bden pa mthong ba la dgod pa'i phrin las yin no// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 
369a4(mdo 'grel): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub 
369a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa la slob par 'tshal bas gzugs la ji ltar bslob par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du gyod rnams dang / rnam par shes 
369a6(mdo 'grel): / pa \u0f7f/ dang / rna dang/ dang/ kyi dang/ pa ma pa ma 
369a7(mdo 'grel): kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams
369a8(mdo 'grel): dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
369b1(mdo 'grel): khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams 
369b2(mdo 'grel): dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te 
369b3(mdo 'grel): reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len
369b4(mdo 'grel): pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab 
369b5(mdo 'grel): par bgyi/ gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang / gzugs can ma lags pa dang / bstan du mchis pa rnams dang / bstan du ma mchis pa rnams dang / thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / 'dus bgyi ba rnams dang / 
369b6(mdo 'grel): 'dus ma bgyis pa rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa ma mchis pa rnams dang // khan mtho ba dang bcas pa rnams dang / khan mthob ma mchis pa rnams dang / dman pa rnams dang / gya nom pa rnams dngag nang gi bdag 
369b7(mdo 'grel): nyid rnams dang / phyi'i bdag nyid rnams dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnams dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 
369b8(mdo 'grel): lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang / 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams dang / slob pa rnams dang / mi slob pa rnam 
370a1(mdo 'grel): dang / slob pa yang ma lags mi slob pa yang ma lags pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ 'dod chags dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba dang / the tshom 
370a2(mdo 'grel): la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ser sna dang / sbyin pa dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims dang / gnod sems dang / bzod pa dang / le lo dang / brtson 'grus dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 
370a3(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / shes rab la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ rnam par rtog pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / log pa'i smon lam dang / smon pa ma mchis 
370a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa'i chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / 
370a5(mdo 'grel): mya ngan las 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di 
370a6(mdo 'grel): skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab
370a7(mdo 'grel): par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o// de nas 
370a8(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'di ni gzugs so 'di ni ming ngo zhes dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/ gang gi tshe 'di ni tshor ba dang / 
370b1(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni ming ngo zhes dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/ gang gi tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar ro// 'di ni ming ngo zhes 'du byed kyi mtshan
370b2(mdo 'grel): ma nye bar gzung ste dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa de'i tshe ji ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs ming tsam zhes bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ming 
370b3(mdo 'grel): tsam zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bkye/ gal te dngos po ma mchis pa lags na de'i ming de yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyi bar mi rung lags te/ gzugs 
370b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyi bar mi rung lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba
370b5(mdo 'grel): gang lags pa 'di yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang 
370b6(mdo 'grel): yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang der glo bur du ming du btags pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni glo bur du ming du 
370b7(mdo 'grel): btags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa 'di yang glo bur du ming du btags pa'o// byams pa gang las 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming der gzugs
370b8(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar yang dag par rtogs pa dang / rab tu rtogs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig par 'gyur te/ byams pa rnam grangs des na gzugs shes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
371a1(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang der glo bur du ming du 
371a2(mdo 'grel): btags pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dngos po 'dir 'ga' zhig 'du shes sam/ nye bar btags pa 'am ming ngam/ tha snyad dam/ mngon par 
371a3(mdo 'grel): shes par gyur pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // 
371a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan pa'i dngos po der glo bur du ming du btags pa yin par rig par bya'o// 
371a5(mdo 'grel): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na ni gzugs zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di dang / tshor 
371a6(mdo 'grel): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du gang lags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po 
371a7(mdo 'grel): gang nye bar bzung nas ming dang 'du shes dang btags pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 
371a8(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs zhes bya bar ming dang 'du shes dang / 'dogs pa dang / rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 
371b1(mdo 'grel): byed pa la/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam btags pa tsam du zad/ gsol pa/ btags pa tsam du bas so// bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags 
371b2(mdo 'grel): so// byams pa 'o na gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas ming dang 'du shes dang 'dogs pa dang rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du 
371b3(mdo 'grel): dmigs zhes de ltar sems/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yin nam 
371b4(mdo 'grel): btags pa tsam du zad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so// bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so// byams pa 'o na de ji ltar tshor ba dang / 'du 
371b5(mdo 'grel): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes ji ltar de snyam du sems/ byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 
371b6(mdo 'grel): 'das gal te gzugs ming dang 'du shes dang brda' dang btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags la/ bcom ldan 'das gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
371b7(mdo 'grel): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang 'du shes dang brda' dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam kho na lags na/ ltar na med dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba gang lags
371b8(mdo 'grel): pa 'di gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de ltar ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 
372a1(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 
372a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang / brda dang btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes/ 
372a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang 'du shes dang brda dang btags pa dang tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la ci gang skye ba 'am 'jig pa 'am/ 
372a4(mdo 'grel): kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'o na khyod 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dang / tshor ba 
372a5(mdo 'grel): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa'o snyam du gang las sems par 'gyur/ byams 
372a6(mdo 'grel): pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis 
372a7(mdo 'grel): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam pa thams cad 
372a8(mdo 'grel): du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do zhes nga mi smra'o// byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang // 
372b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med do zhes nga mi smra'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
372b2(mdo 'grel): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi/ 
372b3(mdo 'grel): don dam par ni ma yin no// byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang / tha snyad kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yod kyi// 
372b4(mdo 'grel): don dam par ni ma yin no// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na don dam par dbyings 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa 
372b5(mdo 'grel): lags na/ de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du 'dogs par 'gyur/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 
372b6(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa 
372b7(mdo 'grel): dbyings su yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir 
372b8(mdo 'grel): khyod nyid la 'dris ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings su shes rab 'jug pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po 
373a1(mdo 'grel): gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
373a2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang 
373a3(mdo 'grel): yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o// byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i 
373a4(mdo 'grel): dngos po der gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du
373a5(mdo 'grel): glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa 'di brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na ni 'o na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
373a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// byams pa gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni 'o na mtshan ma de yang mi 
373a7(mdo 'grel): dmigs na/ ji ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa yang ma yin/ gang la 
373a8(mdo 'grel): gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du
373b1(mdo 'grel): ming du btags pa gang yin pa 'di las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin par rig par bya'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa
373b2(mdo 'grel): dbyings dang 'brel par shes rab 'jug par gnas pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi ba dang / tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes 
373b3(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa ste mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/ 
373b4(mdo 'grel): 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags/ de skad ces gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de ni
373b5(mdo 'grel): yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mngon par rtog pa rnam 
373b6(mdo 'grel): kyis bzung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel par shes rab 'jug par gnas te/ rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe rnam par mi rtog par bzung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das
373b7(mdo 'grel): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de ltar yin na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang du gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes
373b8(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad dam// 
374a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do// de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa rnams dang 'brel par gyur pa na gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang // 
374a2(mdo 'grel): 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la blo bur du ming du btags pa gang yin pa de la yod pa gang
374a3(mdo 'grel): yin gang yod pa ni dmigs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa 
374a4(mdo 'grel): la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba la btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par brtse/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye

374a6(mdo 'grel): zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba la zhugs pa'i brtags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
374a7(mdo 'grel): bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa yang rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun tu brtags pa'i gzugs so// 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs so// 'di dag ni chos 
374a8(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi gzugs so// 'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun tu brtags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun du brtags pa'i 'du shes so// / 
374b1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun tu brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed 
374b2(mdo 'grel): rnams so// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun tu brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 'di lta ste/ 'di dag ni kun tu brtags pa'i
374b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom 
374b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kun tu brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du

374b6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang brtags pa dang tha 
374b7(mdo 'grel): snyad la brten nas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtogs pa 'di ni kun tu brtags pa'i gzugs so// byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang // 
374b8(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang brtags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas/ tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / 
375a1(mdo 'grel): 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun tu brtags pa'i
